definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: The rotten heart to water, dust to be a disappearing eyes.
sentences.chinese: 把发霉的心事交给流水，向远去的尘埃行个注目礼。

sentences.english: Bread tends to mold in damp wea-ther.
sentences.chinese: 面包在潮湿的天气里容易发霉。

sentences.english: She chucked the mouldy potatoes in the litterbin.
sentences.chinese: 她把发霉的土豆扔进垃圾箱。

sentences.english: A fetid odor seeps from the walls, the odor of a mildewed mattress.
sentences.chinese: 墙里渗出一股恶臭味，那是发霉的床垫味。

sentences.english: A piece of home-baked bread say left on your kitchen counter will get moldy relatively fast.
sentences.chinese: 一片家烤的面包，被放在厨房台面上，很快就会发霉。

sentences.english: Do you smell the reek of stale tobacco?
sentences.chinese: 你闻到发霉烟草的臭味了吗？

sentences.english: The room smelled musty and stale.
sentences.chinese: 这个房间闻起来有股发霉的陈味儿。

sentences.english: Foods are easily to be mouldy in humid days.
sentences.chinese: 潮湿的日子里，食物很容易发霉。

sentences.english: Things easily get mildewed in the rainy season.
sentences.chinese: 梅雨季节东西容易发霉。

sentences.english: Open, the smell that put that mildew.
sentences.chinese: 打开吧，通放那发霉的气味。

sentences.english: I kick aside an abandoned bag of swimming gear, damp and mildewed.
sentences.chinese: 我把一袋废弃的潮湿发霉的游泳用具踢到一边。
天气潮湿时衣服会发霉。

sentences.english: Mycelium on cereal grain is termed mold growth .
sentences.chinese: 在谷物上生长的菌丝体叫做发霉。

sentences.english: Her girls in mildew green sateen.
sentences.chinese: 她的女儿们穿着发霉的绿棉缎。

sentences.english: The shelves are loaded with old musty books whose pages have become yellowish.
sentences.chinese: 书架上堆着发霉的旧书，书页已经又黄又脆。

sentences.english: The longer drying period can permit molding and destroy the cassava.
sentences.chinese: 长时间的晾晒过程还会引起发霉，从而毁掉木薯。

definition: (of clothing, furniture, walls etc) to get damp (by absorbing moisture from the air or the ground)
to degenerate/to deteriorate/(of food) to go bad/to go off/(geology) metamorphism
(milk) to turn sour/(meat, fish) to go off
(of the sun) to scorch/to expose to a scorching sun
